Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 28. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016
